question:
You recently attended a meeting at a hotel. When you returned home , you found you had left some important paper at the hotel . 


Write a letter to the manager of the hotel . In your letter 
•	Say where you think you left the papers 
•	Explain why they are so important 
•	Tell the manager what you want him/her to do
text: I am writing this letter to request you to find some important papers which I left in your hotel yesterday evening after my meeting  .

As I remembered , I attended a meeting at Kanaung Room which is located next to the ballroom .After the meeting , I went to the toilet with my belongings and forgot to take one black envelope which is on the table .I think in this room only I left my documents.
This envelope includes my important personal documents like degree certificates .Those  items are difficult to obtain from the authorities if I lost them.
Therefore ,I would like to request you to give it back if you already kept those documents with you ,else could you please look for those items in your hotel room like checking CCTV records .
I hope you could help me and I am looking forward to hearing from you .
